Text: I forgot to put this in the description, but Parts 1 and 2 have different vertical resolutions (512 and 544 respectively) because of the framing rectangle in Part 2 being tilted as noted.
Another thing I forgot: yes, the source DVD was an original, not a cheap burned one in a thin case from a flea market. :^) So the errors are inherent in the official release of this film.
